entry.summary:
I apologize for any confusion, but it seems there was an error in the provided context. The message "@ajtowns you're on the hook for redrawing all of them now" does not contain enough content or information to summarize into a blog post based on your provided rules. It appears to be a fragment of a conversation possibly from a programming-related discussion.
If this message is part of a larger email or conversation, please provide the full text so I can assist you in creating an appropriate summary. Otherwise, if you need assistance with another task or have further questions related to programming or any other topic, feel free to ask!
